title: Vintage of Regret
description: An auction in the High Ward lists a sealed case of Pre-Scourge Void-Wine as a luxury curiosity. Ward Warden Astrid suspects this wine is far more potent than modern diluted versions and could be catastrophically dangerous if consumed. She wants it intercepted before the sale.

turns.narrative: The auction house is full of well-dressed High Ward citizens thumbing catalogues. The Void-Wine case is lot fourteen, listed as 'Pre-Scourge Curiosity — Non-Potable Display Item.' However the wax seals are intact, suggesting it could still be consumed by a wealthy eccentric.
turns.choice_a: Approach Tol the Auctioneer and request lot fourteen be withdrawn
turns.consequence_a: Tol is irritated but agrees to pause the lot pending an official inspection request from Astrid.
turns.choice_b: Identify the anticipated buyer and whisper in their ear about the risks before bidding starts
turns.consequence_b: Lord Edric looks alarmed. He withdraws his bidding card. With no competitive buyer the lot fails to sell.

turns.narrative: Astrid wants either the wine secured as evidence or quietly destroyed. There is also the question of who consigned the lot — a name on the consignment paper reads 'Estate of Vel de Haas' — a High Ward noble family that supposedly died out before the Scourge.
turns.choice_a: Secure the wine case for Astrid and investigate the de Haas consignment
turns.consequence_a: The wine is secured. The consignment appears to be from a Pre-Scourge estate accessed by a recent property buyer.
turns.choice_b: Have the wine destroyed on the auction house floor to prevent any future risk
turns.consequence_b: Tol is furious but Astrid's authority is sufficient. The case is smashed. The Void inside dissipates harmlessly in the air.

turns.narrative: Resolving this raises the question of what else might be in the de Haas estate.
turns.choice_a: Recommend Astrid open a formal investigation into the de Haas property
turns.consequence_a: Investigators find a partially intact wine cellar and several more sealed cases, all secured.
turns.choice_b: File a note and let the matter rest for now
turns.consequence_b: The case is closed. The de Haas property stays unexamined for now.

estate_investigated.description: De Haas estate opened. Multiple cases of Pre-Scourge wine secured.

matter_rested.description: Wine destroyed. De Haas estate left for now.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: De Haas estate opened. Multiple cases of Pre-Scourge wine secured.
